statements: DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 123 AND creation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' AND content LIKE '%advanced%' AND author = 'Alice Wonderland';
DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE id IN (SELECT material_id FROM employee_reviews WHERE rating < 3);
DELETE FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id = 3 AND material_id = 4;
DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1 AND material_name = 'Example Material'
DELETE FROM material_categories WHERE category_id = 1 OR category_name = 'Example Category'
DELETE FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR')
